Reference

All functions

Math(<units>)

Mathematical operations for units objects

Ops(<units>)

S3 Ops Group Generic Functions for units objects

as_difftime()

convert units object into difftime object

boxplot(<units>)

boxplot for unit objects

deparse_unit()

deparse unit to string in product power form (e.g. km m-2 s-1)

drop_units()

Drop Units

hist(<units>)

histogram for unit objects

install_conversion_constant() install_conversion_offset()

Install a conversion constant or offset between user-defined units.

install_symbolic_unit() remove_symbolic_unit()

Define new symbolic units

install_unit() remove_unit()

Define or remove units

keep_units()

Apply a function keeping units

load_units_xml()

Load a unit system

mixed_units() `units<-`(<mixed_units>)

Create or convert to a mixed units list-column

make_unit_label() plot(<units>)

create axis label with appropriate labels

seq(<units>)

seq method for units objects

ud_are_convertible()

Test if two units are convertible

unitless

The "unit" type for vectors that are actually dimension-less.

`units<-`(<numeric>) `units<-`(<units>) `units<-`(<logical>) units(<units>) units(<symbolic_units>) set_units() make_units() as_units()

Handle measurement units

units_options()

set one or more units global options

valid_udunits() valid_udunits_prefixes()

Get information about valid units
